lead_paragraph: Most Americans want Olympic athletes to keep their political views to themselves in Rio de Janeiro, according to a new Reuters/Ipsos poll, despite one of the most intense political build-ups to the Games in recent decades.

headline.print_headline: Americans Want Politics-Free Rio Games: Reuters/Ipsos Poll
headline.main: Americans Want Politics-Free Rio Games: Reuters/Ipsos Poll

snippet: Most Americans want Olympic athletes to keep their political views to themselves in Rio de Janeiro, according to a new Reuters/Ipsos poll, despite one of the most intense political build-ups to the Games in recent decades....
